their service just brought me a lot of pain hassle and inconvenience rather than convenience i have been using gcash for more than two years but now i am ending it due to poor service and faulty system  negatives 1 i do not recommend to use this service for shopping online it will just bring you a lot of hassle due to the following reasons    a creditsrefunds are not automatically added to your account you have to call their hotline for that refund and ask you to fill up and sign a dispute form     b most purchases although the amount has already been deducted from your account are unsuccessful and will just cause you to have problems with your orders online  2 if there are credits or adjustments related to your purchases or subscriptions those adjustments will not reflect to your account automatically therefore you will have to really monitor your transactions happening in your gcash account which i think will just provide me a lot of hassle and additional work  3 buying loads with other networks only work sometimes and not all the time

attention people who are having issues with linking their paypal accounts with gcash after the 42 update  i too had the issue and i have been through hell and back pero finally nakakita na ako nang workaround sa issue after 2 months  if you have android 70 like me  issue pala if enabled ung android system webview and by default this is included w chrome etong app ang reason nang lahat nang sakit sa ulo ko lol gawin nyo lang is pumunta sa settings gt google chrome gt uninstall updates after niyan try niyo link and it will work at least for me it did  sa other androids  punta lang kayo sa settings gt apps gt android system webview and disableforce stop niyo guys go to gcash and link your paypal and this will work  hope this helps guys special mention sa  gcash support at least pleasant sila and sa unpleasant na cs sa 3 branches na pinuntahan ko
